breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
breakfast.description: A delicious parfait made with creamy Greek yogurt, fresh berries, and a sprinkle of granola for crunch.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: A refreshing salad with grilled chicken breast, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a light vinaigrette.

dinner.name: Quinoa Stir-Fry
dinner.description: A hearty stir-fry with quinoa, mixed vegetables, and tofu, seasoned with soy sauce and sesame oil.

items.name: Almonds
items.description: A handful of roasted almonds for a healthy fat and protein boost.

items.name: Apple with Peanut Butter
items.description: A crisp apple sliced and served with creamy peanut butter for a satisfying snack.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Banana and Nuts
breakfast.description: Warm oatmeal topped with sliced banana and a mix of nuts for a filling start to the day.

lunch.name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
lunch.description: A whole grain wrap filled with turkey, avocado, lettuce, and tomato, served with a side of carrot sticks.

dinner.name: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
dinner.description: Oven-baked salmon fillet served with roasted asparagus and a side of brown rice.

items.name: Hummus with Veggies
items.description: Creamy hummus served with a variety of fresh vegetables for dipping.

items.name: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple
items.description: A bowl of cottage cheese topped with sweet pineapple chunks for a refreshing snack.
